name: It Lurked In The Bathtub
description:
It Lurked In The Bathtub is a short, silly game about getting locked out of your own bathroom by a monster that lurks in a submarine. It was made in around two weeks for the Summer of Shivers 2021 Game Jam.

Writing, Programming & Music : Leaflet : https://twitter.com/LetLeaf
Art : Dragonsbutalsorabbits : https://dragons-but-also-rabbits.itch.io
Font : Castpixel : https://twitter.com/castpixel

Game Soundtrack : https://soundcloud.com/user-161601946-374728707/sets/it-lurked-in-the-bathtub

Don't forget your rubber ducky!

IMPORTANT NOTE : This game contains short instances of spinning bathtubs, which, as silly (or wonderful) as that sounds, could be seizure-unfriendly. Please consider extracting the file named "It Lurked In The Bathroom (Alt)" instead of the "normal" one if you are prone to seizures!
